name: Xenotoxin
description:
Xenotoxin, survival horror prototype

This is a project intended for the minijam 129/Poison https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-129-poison

Note, this game plays significantly better in when downloaded.

You are being infected by nano bots with a neural toxin, you must find injectables to reduce your increasing toxicity. Find syringes to add back health. Avoid infected personnel, they will attack on sight and hurt you. Finally, use the AED to shock and kill others, remember to keep it charged!

Note, I realize the doors are acting a bit difficult to open at times, alas keep trying from different positions. I didn't have time to fix this for the jam.

This game has partial controller support:

Left joystick move, X to interact

Keyboard and mouse:

1 and 2 on the keyboard will use the health syringe and neural injection.

Left mouse button interacts, right makes player run, move mouse to look around.

All 3d gameart is my own developed during the gamejam.

All code was developed during the gamejam.

Icons, sounds, and font are CC0 assets with links to the author's content (found in text files in the main folder)

Music is from PM Cinematic Soundscape II pack I purchased as a HumbleBumble pack.
